mapper.insert: insert into WORKREPLY(bno, reply, replyId) values (#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyId})
mapper.select: select * from(select @rownum := @rownum +1 rn, a.* from (select bno, rno, reply, replyId, replyDate, replyUpdate from WORKREPLY where BNO = #{bno} order by BNO desc) a ) b, (select @rownum :=0) c where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount} and rn <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) as total from WORKREPLY where BNO = #{bno}
mapper.update: update WORKREPLY set REPLY = #{reply}, REPLYUPDATE = now() where RNO = #{rno}
